mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DoList ( user_id, d_content, d_start_date, d_end_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{d_content}, #{d_start_date}, #{d_end_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT d_seq, user_id, d_content, d_state, DATE_FORMAT(d_start_date, "%Y-%m-%d") as d_start_date, DATE_FORMAT(d_end_date, "%Y-%m-%d") as d_end_date FROM DoList ORDER BY d_seq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE DoList SET d_state = "D" WHERE d_seq = #{d_seq}
UPDATE DoList SET d_state = "E" WHERE d_seq = #{d_seq}
